descripcionCorta: Urban photography session in Puerto Madero.
descripcionLarga: A visual production project focused on capturing urban atmosphere, architecture, and natural light in Puerto Madero. The session explores composition, contrast, and storytelling through photography.

descripcionCorta: Eco-friendly e-commerce interface design.
descripcionLarga: A complete UX/UI design for EcoMarket, an online store specialized in selling ecological products. The project includes user research, wireframes, UI kit, and a full responsive prototype.

descripcionCorta: Child-oriented redesign of the Grido app.
descripcionLarga: A redesign of the Grido ice cream application focused on children, featuring playful visuals, an adapted information architecture, accessibility adjustments, and interactive components.

descripcionCorta: A fictional restaurant website for Krusty Krab.
descripcionLarga: A UX/UI project for a fictional hamburger restaurant inspired by SpongeBob. The design includes a full layout system, color palette, custom illustrations, and responsive flows.

descripcionCorta: A productivity app for university students.
descripcionLarga: A mobile-first UX/UI design for an application that helps students organize courses, tasks, notes, and deadlines. The prototype includes dark/light mode and custom iconography.

descripcionCorta: User research for a university information totem.
descripcionLarga: A complete UX research project including benchmarking, surveys, interviews, usability analysis, and low/high-fidelity prototypes for a digital totem intended for campus use.

descripcionCorta: Training assistant app for swimmers.
descripcionLarga: A design project for a mobile application that allows swimmers to track workouts, goals, distances, and performance. Includes a structured design system and interactive prototype.

descripcionCorta: A short 2D animation inspired by Aladdin.
descripcionLarga: Frame-by-frame 2D animation recreating scenes inspired by Disney's Aladdin. Focus on timing, exaggeration, and character motion.

descripcionCorta: Motion typography exploration.
descripcionLarga: A motion graphics exercise focused on kinetic typography, rhythm, pacing, and harmony between text and sound.

descripcionCorta: Detailed eye movement animation study.
descripcionLarga: A short study focused on animating organic movement, blinking cycles, and smooth interpolation.

descripcionCorta: Short advertising spot for Rappi.
descripcionLarga: A commercial created for Techniques of Audiovisual Production. Includes scriptwriting, filming, acting direction, editing, and color correction.

descripcionCorta: A full music video production.
descripcionLarga: Group final project involving conceptualization, filming, directing, editing, color grading, and narrative construction.

descripcionCorta: Projection mapping for a university event.
descripcionLarga: A complete audiovisual projection mapping developed for a faculty event. Includes 3D planning, light analysis, and synchronized animation.

descripcionCorta: Graphic design final exploring composition.
descripcionLarga: A final project analyzing visual composition, contrast, negative space, and geometric balance through print-based layouts.

descripcionCorta: Typography-based graphic composition.
descripcionLarga: A typographic visual exploration experimenting with hierarchy, shapes, grids, and expressive letter arrangement.

descripcionCorta: Vintage-style advertising for Nintendo.
descripcionLarga: A print ad recreated with a retro art direction, using typographic era references, color research, and layout reconstruction.

descripcionCorta: Exercise exploring color and layout.
descripcionLarga: A practical assignment experimenting with color theory, visual rhythm, and modular composition.

descripcionCorta: Second practice exploring contrast and form.
descripcionLarga: An academic project centered on contrasts, textures, and visual hierarchy, forming part of the subject’s TP set.

descripcionCorta: Brand identity for architect Ana Sibilia.
descripcionLarga: A professional branding project: logo design, color palette, typography system, and social media templates for architect Ana Sibilia.

descripcionCorta: Social media graphics for a dentist.
descripcionLarga: Graphic design work for odontologist Félix Pequer, including banners, instagram posts, typography and color direction.

descripcionCorta: Branding for a nutrition professional.
descripcionLarga: Complete identity system including logo variations, color palette, social media materials, and graphic direction for a nutrition consultant.

descripcionCorta: Visual identity for a catering brand.
descripcionLarga: Professional identity manual for a catering entrepreneurship, including print materials, digital branding, and logo construction.

descripcionCorta: Identity and social media for a vet clinic.
descripcionLarga: Logo design, color system, icons, and social media visual strategy for LifeMed Veterinary.

descripcionCorta: Static website built with HTML and CSS.
descripcionLarga: A responsive website built fully with HTML and CSS based on a predefined design. Focused on layout building, flexbox/grid, and component organization.

descripcionCorta: Interactive project using the Marvel API.
descripcionLarga: A JavaScript web application using the Marvel REST API to retrieve characters, comics, and data dynamically.

descripcionCorta: Solar system animation using Web Animations API.
descripcionLarga: A dynamic 2D representation of a solar system using JavaScript and the Web Animations API to animate orbits, rotations, and transitions.

descripcionCorta: Vue app to create weekly meal plans.
descripcionLarga: A Vue.js application that allows users to organize meals for the week, including component architecture, reactive state, and dynamic rendering.

descripcionCorta: Vue app for organizing travel routes.
descripcionLarga: A Vue.js application for storing and organizing travel itineraries, including form handling, routing, and views.

descripcionCorta: Object-oriented event reservation system.
descripcionLarga: Academic project applying OOP principles to create an event reservation system: classes, inheritance, encapsulation, and dynamic filtering.

descripcionCorta: Portfolio site coded with High Script.
descripcionLarga: A full website coded using High Script for multimedia artist Pato Reikler, including animations, custom components, and interactive gallery.

descripcionCorta: JS mini-game featuring a timed challenge.
descripcionLarga: A simple but dynamic game coded in JavaScript, where the player must disable a virtual time bomb before the countdown reaches zero.

descripcionCorta: Physical card game based on solving crimes.
descripcionLarga: A tabletop card game designed around deduction, clues, and strategic storytelling. Includes card layout, rule system, and printed prototype.

descripcionCorta: 3D isometric room featuring a shark barista.
descripcionLarga: A stylized 3D interior design created in isometric perspective. The scene features a shark character working as a barista, with props, lighting, and texturing.
